title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Social Sector Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical learning design conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, considering workplace applicability for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more real-world cases using a social issue analysis framework.
Learners can complete over 80% of microlearning content provided in a mobile environment and reconstruct and explain core concepts.
Learners can propose specific solutions to social problems through project-based assessments and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
